data.text: @Tonywaikainga On tourism, yes. The restrictions have been working up to now. Omicron is a whole different animal.
@tjwhitfordnz Not me untill yesterday , I been doing my business in countries with open borders , Nz has been missing out real bad
@Tonywaikainga Of course, and people who need to travel for business have been doing so.
@tjwhitfordnz @1NewsNZ Some folks need to travel , important business

@Tonywaikainga @1NewsNZ That’s….nice? Am I supposed to have some kind of feelings about that? It doesn’t effect me either way. I just get on with my life and my job. When we can travel, we will travel. 🤷🏻‍♀️
@1NewsNZ More crap stop with the crap it’s a runny nose you idiots no one’s dying you’re full of cow dung!
@tjwhitfordnz @1NewsNZ 😂😂😂😂 October??? Everyone is travelling right now mate , you should see this airport I’m at , folks leaving and arriving like covid never happened
@Tonywaikainga @1NewsNZ Borders were reopened to NZ residents and citizens in Australia today. Tourists will be welcomed in October. It’s a gradual process.
@1NewsNZ And the world keeps on spinning 🥱
